whereisit.config.title: Where Is It
whereisit.config.client.closeGuiOnFoundR: Whether the GUI will close if results were found. Will only happen once per search.
whereisit.config.client.fadeoutTime.desc: How long it takes world and slot highlights to fade out.
whereisit.config.client.showSlotHighligh: Whether to highlight slots that matched the last search.
whereisit.config.client.randomScheme.des: Whether to use a random pride colour scheme each search
whereisit.config.client.compatibility.re: Requires the mod to be installed to function.
whereisit.config.client.compatibility.je: Allows Where Is It to obtain the item from JEI's overlays and recipe screens.
whereisit.config.client.compatibility.re: Allows Where Is It to obtain the item from REI's overlays and recipe screens.
whereisit.config.client.compatibility.em: Allows Where Is It to obtain the item from EMI's overlays and recipe screens.
whereisit.config.common.searchRange.desc: Radius from the player's position to search for items.
Whether to search within certain items that contain other items, such as Shulker Boxes or Bundles.
